subject: Order status
description_text:
Hello,

I placed an order on 25 december with the economy shipping but besides the
confirmation i havent received any other email and the order's status has
not changed from confirmed on the website. Can i have some information when
will the product be shipped or if it's at least being processed? The
order's number is #SSN5274.

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并至工单 10549。
